item.title: Thunderbird v60.3.0 solves them all!
item.description: As I mentioned in a previous note, when I installed the version 60.0-3 of Thunderbird I was no longer able to write new emails and so I had to downgrade to v.52.9.1. Since that time, things have gotten worst as I was no longer able to get hyperlinks opening the corresponding page in my web browser ðŸ˜±. I did not look for a fix, I simply coped with it waiting for an update.
